bcbioRNASeq 0.99.0

Markdown

Source: R/markdown-methods.R
markdown.Rd

Markdown

markdown(object, ...)

# S4 method for bcbioRNASeq
markdown(object)

# S4 method for DESeqResultsTables
markdown(object, headerLevel = 2L)

# S4 method for DESeqAnalysis
markdown(object)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Additional arguments.
headerLevel

scalar integer (1-7). R Markdown header level.

Value

Markdown output.

Methods (by class)

  • bcbioRNASeq: Sample metadata table.

  • DESeqResultsTables: File paths (if exported) and top tables.

  • DESeqAnalysis: List of contrast names.

See also

Other Markdown Functions: markdownHeader, markdownLink, markdownList, markdownPlotlist, markdownTables, prepareTemplate

Examples

data(deseq_small)
x <- DESeqResultsTables(deseq_small)
#> DESeqResults: treatment folic acid vs control (shrunken LFC)
#> Adding `rowData()` annotations (atomic columns only).
#> [1] "broadClass"     "description"    "geneBiotype"    "geneID"        
#> [5] "geneName"       "seqCoordSystem"
markdown(x)
#> 
#> 
#> ## treatment folic acid vs control
#> 
#> Object doesn't contain saved file paths.
#> 
#>
